page.title: 08TEACHING FACILITIES
page.content: THE NEW SCHOOL CONSISTS OF FOUR CLASS- ROOMS,TWO JUNIOR AND TWO INFANT,A KITCHEN HALL,TOILETS,STAFFROOM AND TWO OFFICES(HEAD AND SECRETARY).AN AREA IN ONE OF THE INFANT CLASSES IS USED BY MOTHERS WITH THEIR TODDLERS FOR VARIOUS LEARNING AND RECREATION ACTIVITIES.IT IS CALLED THE 'MALTHUS ROOM'AFTER THE BENEFICIARY OF THE SCHOOL ROOM'AFTER THE BENEFICIARY OF THE SCHOOL.PLAYGROUNDS AND PLAYING FIELDS,WHICH INCLUDE A SWIMMING POOL, AN ORCHARD,POND AND WILD AREA FOR NATURE STUDIES,SURROUND THE SCHOOL. THE STAFF CONSISTS OF FOUR TEACHERS INCLUDING THE HEADMISTRESS,A PART- TIME TEACHER,A SECRETARY,TWO WELFARE ASSISTANTS,A CARETAKER ,TWO CLEANERS AND KITCHEN STAFF.THE SCHOOL DAY IS FROM NINE A.M.UNTIL THREE P.M.THERE IS A FIFTEEN MINUTES BREAK AT 10.4O AND AN HOUR AT 12.0'CLOCK FOR LUNCH.
